notes.player:
On ally/self within Medium range deals Critical that deals damage: reroll keep better d10 to determine hit table result

Whenever an ally (including yourself) within Medium Range inflicts a Critical Hit on an enemy with an attack that causes Damage, you may roll an additional 1d10 on the appropriate Critical Hit Table and discard the lowest result.

requirement.value: Faithful (Imperial Cult) Talent, 1 Advance in Presence(Leadership) and 1 Advance in Presence(Intimidation)
requirement.script: return (this.actor.itemTypes["specialisation"].find(i => i.name == "Leadership" && i.system.skill == "presence")?.system?.advances >= 1) && (this.actor.itemTypes["specialisation"].find(i => i.name == "Intimidation" && i.system.skill == "presence")?.system?.advances >= 1) && this.actor.itemTypes["talent"].find(i => i.name == "Faithful(Imperial Cult)")
